arts.ttl: Marco Baroni Slams Lazio ‘Messy’ Performance vs 10-Man Lecce
arts.sum: Lazio bounced back from an embarrassing 6-0 home defeat to Inter on Monday with a 2-1 win against 10-man Lecce last evening. Marco Baroni's side left it late to beat Roberto D'Aversa's strugglers as Adam Marusic netted a last-gasp winner. The post Marco Baroni Slams Lazio ‘Messy’ Performance vs 10-Man Lecce appeared first on The Cult of Calcio.

arts.ttl: Late Adam Marusic Volley Secures Vital Win for Underwhelming Lazio Over 10-Man Lecce
arts.sum: Despite their numerical advantage, Lazio were made to sweat to earn a timely victory over Lecce at the Via del Mare. The Lineup Taty Castellanos made his return from suspension to spearhead Marco Baroni’s 4-2-3-1 lineup, while Gustav Isaksen, Boulaye Dia and Mattia Zaccagni were the supporting crew. Alessio Romagnoli made a swift return from […] The post Late Adam Marusic Volley Secures Vital Win for Underwhelming Lazio Over 10-Man Lecce appeared first on The Laziali.

arts.ttl: Serie A | Lecce 1-2 Lazio: Match Report
arts.sum: Lazio secured a dramatic 2-1 victory against 10-man Lecce, with Adam Marusic scoring the decisive goal in the 87th minute. This win was essential for the Biancocelesti, who were still reeling from a heavy 6-0 defeat to Inter Milan, despite having shown strong form in Serie A, the Coppa Italia, and the Europa League prior to that match. The post Serie A | Lecce 1-2 Lazio: Match Report appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: This Week In Lazio History: December 16-22
arts.sum: This week in Lazio history we remember some fantastic wins, another Caicedo last second goal, the 2019 Supercoppa and the passing of Sinisa Mihajlovic. Matches of the Week Date: Sunday, December 17, 1995 Venue: Stadio Olimpico, Rome Fixture: Lazio Sampdoria 6-3 Lazio win never in doubt in high scoring game thanks to Signori, Winter, Casiraghi […] The post This Week In Lazio History: December 16-22 appeared first on The Laziali.

arts.ttl: Lazio Have the Upper Hand Over Boca Juniors & River Plate in the Race for Young Argentine Defender
arts.sum: Lazio are reportedly in a prime position to snatch the services of Valez Sarsfield youngster Valentin Gomez. The Background The 21-year-old is a left-footed central defender who started his career at Sarsfield’s academy, climbing his way up the club’s ranks to become a member of the senior squad in January 2022.
